trait.name: Flyby
text: The archaeopteryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The archaeopteryx makes two attacks. one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
